name: arrival_times_holiday_homes
title: Arrival Times Holiday Homes
description:
The Arrival Times Holiday Homes data set contains information on individual transactions for booking accommodation in Arosa Lenzerheide. The data set contains 700 individual transactions that comprise the period between 01.01.2014 to 01.01.2017. The columns in the data set include transaction number, product (size of holiday home), number of people, number of nights, date of arrival, date of departure and booking time and date. The data is available in German.
